description: Imagine Studio DevTeam - Complete workflow with 4 specialized agents (Planner, Coder, Reviewer, Tester) working in sequence to implement sprint tasks with AAA quality standards.
label: Imagine Studio DevTeam

participants.description: Sprint Manager - Plans tasks and proposes implementation steps
Implementation Specialist - Writes AAA-quality C++14 code
Quality Assurance - Reviews code against AAA standards
Build & Validation - Compiles (CMake + MSBuild) and runs tests

conditions.description: Terminate when build succeeds and ready for commit
conditions.label: BuildSuccess

metadata.description: Complete CI/CD-like workflow for sprint task implementation

steps.output: Implementation plan with steps and files

error_handling.review_fails: Loop back to coder with reviewer feedback
error_handling.build_fails: Loop back to coder with tester error analysis

usage_instructions.how_to_use: Import all 4 agent JSON files into AutoGen Studio, then import this workflow JSON. The agents will work in sequence automatically.
usage_instructions.initial_prompt_template:
Implement task {TASK_ID} from Sprint {SPRINT_VERSION}.

Context:
- Sprint: {SPRINT_VERSION} - {SPRINT_NAME}
- Task: {TASK_ID} - {TASK_NAME}
- Files to read: docs/daily.md, docs/sprint_tasks.md

Workflow:
1. Planner: Read task details and create implementation plan
2. Coder: Implement code following AAA standards
3. Reviewer: Review code quality
4. Tester: Compile (CMake + MSBuild) and test
5. If all OK: Update docs/daily.md and commit
usage_instructions.example_prompt:
Implement task H1.1 from Sprint v1.9.0.

Context:
- Sprint: v1.9.0 - Asset System & Resource Management
- Task: H1.1 - Crear AssetDatabase.h
- Files to read: docs/daily.md, docs/sprint_tasks.md

Workflow:
1. Planner: Read task details and create implementation plan
2. Coder: Implement AssetDatabase.h
3. Reviewer: Review code quality
4. Tester: Compile (CMake + MSBuild)
5. If all OK: Update docs/daily.md and commit
